content: I think I'll try the jasmine rice, since I've been wanting to try out a new type of rice. I've been taking cooking classes at a local culinary school, and we recently learned how to make homemade pasta from scratch, which was a game-changer for me. I've been making it for dinner at least once a week since then. I'm excited to try out this shrimp stir-fry recipe and serve it with the jasmine rice.
